trans-unit.source: Presents the packet information from a call to <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveMessageFrom(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" /> or <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveMessageFrom(System.IAsyncResult,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" />.
trans-unit.target: Presenta la información de paquete de una llamada a <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveMessageFrom(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" /> o <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveMessageFrom(System.IAsyncResult,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the origin information of the packet that was received as a result of calling the <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveMessageFrom(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" /> method or <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveMessageFrom(System.IAsyncResult,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la información del origen del paquete que se recibió como resultado de una llamada al método <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveMessageFrom(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" /> o <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveMessageFrom(System.IAsyncResult,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Net.IPAddress" /> that indicates the origin information of the packet that was received as a result of calling the <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveMessageFrom(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" /> method or <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveMessageFrom(System.IAsyncResult,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Una <see cref="T:System.Net.IPAddress" /> que indica la información del origen del paquete recibido como resultado de llamar al método <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveMessageFrom(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" /> o al método <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveMessageFrom(System.IAsyncResult,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" />.

trans-unit.source: For packets that were sent from a unicast address, the <see cref="P:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Address" /> property will return the <see cref="T:System.Net.IPAddress" /> of the sender; for multicast or broadcast packets, the <see cref="P:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Address" /> property will return the multicast or broadcast <see cref="T:System.Net.IPAddress" />.
trans-unit.target: Para los paquetes enviados desde una dirección unidifusión, la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Address" /> devolverá la <see cref="T:System.Net.IPAddress" /> del remitente; en el caso de los paquetes de multidifusión o difusión, la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Address" /> devolverá la <see cref="T:System.Net.IPAddress" /> de multidifusión o difusión.

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with this instance.
trans-unit.target: Objeto que se va a comparar con esta instancia.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether this instance is equal to a specified object.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve un valor que indica si esta instancia equivale a un objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="comparand" /> is an instance of <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation" /> and equals the value of the instance; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> si <paramref name="comparand" /> es una instancia de <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation" /> y es igual al valor de la instancia; en caso contrario, es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve el código hash de esta instancia.

trans-unit.source: An Int32 hash code.
trans-unit.target: Un código hash Int32.

trans-unit.source: The hash code is constructed from the values of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Address%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Interface%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: El código hash se construye a partir de los valores de la <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Address%2A> y <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Interface%2A> propiedades.

trans-unit.source: Gets the network interface information that is associated with a call to <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveMessageFrom(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" /> or <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveMessageFrom(System.IAsyncResult,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la información de la interfaz de red que está asociada a una llamada a <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveMessageFrom(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" /> o <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveMessageFrom(System.IAsyncResult,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value, which represents the index of the network interface.
trans-unit.target: Un valor <see cref="T:System.Int32" />, que representa el índice de la interfaz de red.

trans-unit.source: You can use this index with <see cref="M:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInterface.GetAllNetworkInterfaces" /> to get more information about the relevant interface.
trans-unit.target: Este índice se puede utilizar con <see cref="M:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInterface.GetAllNetworkInterfaces" /> para obtener más información sobre la interfaz pertinente.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation" /> instance that is to the left of the equality operator.
trans-unit.target: Instancia de <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation" /> situada a la izquierda del operador de igualdad.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation" /> instance that is to the right of the equality operator.
trans-unit.target: Instancia de <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation" /> situada a la derecha del operador de igualdad.

trans-unit.source: Tests whether two specified <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation" /> instances are equivalent.
trans-unit.target: Comprueba si dos instancias de <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation" /> especificadas son equivalentes.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="packetInformation1" /> and <paramref name="packetInformation2" /> are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> si <paramref name="packetInformation1" /> y <paramref name="packetInformation2" /> son iguales; en caso contrario, es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This operator tests both the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Address%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Interface%2A> values for both arguments.
trans-unit.target: Este operador comprueba tanto el <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Address%2A> y <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Interface%2A> valores para ambos argumentos.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Equals(System.Object)>.
trans-unit.target: El método equivalente para este operador es <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Equals(System.Object)>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation" /> instance that is to the left of the inequality operator.
trans-unit.target: Instancia de <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation" /> situada a la izquierda del operador de desigualdad.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation" /> instance that is to the right of the inequality operator.
trans-unit.target: Instancia de <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation" /> situada a la derecha del operador de desigualdad.

trans-unit.source: Tests whether two specified <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation" /> instances are not equal.
trans-unit.target: Comprueba si dos instancias especificadas de <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation" /> no son iguales.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="packetInformation1" /> and <paramref name="packetInformation2" /> are unequal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> si <paramref name="packetInformation1" /> y <paramref name="packetInformation2" /> no son iguales; en caso contrario, es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This operator tests both the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Address%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Interface%2A> values for both arguments.
trans-unit.target: Este operador comprueba tanto el <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Address%2A> y <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Interface%2A> valores para ambos argumentos.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Equals(System.Object)>.
trans-unit.target: El método equivalente para este operador es <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Equals(System.Object)>.
